mapper.insert: insert into info_ezstop (ezstop_id, ezstop_uid, ezstop_air_time, ezstop_end_time, "ezstop_parking area code") values (#{ezstopId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ezstopUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ezstopAirTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ezstopEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ezstopParkingAreaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
